attributes.action: Grant Independence to each nation of Great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's time to annul the international marriage of England and Scotland.

Without doubt, it's been one of the greatest and longest running success stories in the modern world (if not the THE greatest), but its time has passed.

The English don't want to be governed by the Scots, and the Scots don't want to be governed from London.

We will still retain the uniqueness of our strong alliance - but let us please each have our own governments to deal with our own affairs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
